content.query:
CREATE DATABASE newDB;
GO

USE newDB
GO

-- DROP MASTER KEY;
-- GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Password@123'
GO

-- Used this managed identity
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL myCredential
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'
GO

-- connect with the storage account
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE myDateSource WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://gen2storageacc1414.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = myCredential
)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquetFileFormat WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA NYCTaxi;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTaxi.passengerDetails
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'synapsecontainer/NYCTaxi_2/Data',
    DATA_SOURCE = myDateSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = parquetFileFormat
)
AS 
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://gen2storageacc1414.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsecontainer/Data/NYCTripSmallSSP.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

SELECT * FROM NYCTaxi.passengerDetails
